awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: A group of social misfits band together and run away from summer camp. Along the way, they take up a crusade to save penned in buffaloes from a rifle club's slaughter.
plot: A group of social misfits band together and run away from summer camp. Along the way, they take up a crusade to save penned in buffaloes from a rifle club's slaughter.
title: Bless the Beasts & Children
